alert.note: Alert for Allen; De Kalb; Noble (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 19 at 3:56PM EST by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Allen, southeastern Noble, De Kalb, Defiance and southern Williams Counties through 445 PM EST... At 355 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Avilla to near Woodburn to near Convoy. Movement was northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Defiance, Auburn, Bryan, Garrett, Montpelier, Hicksville, Butler, Edgerton, Edon, St. Joe, Edgerton In Williams County, Pulaski, Concord, Farmer, Newville, Ney, Altona, Blakeslee, Evansport and Butler Center. This includes Interstate 69 in Indiana between mile markers 322 and 331. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 700 PM EST for northeastern Indiana...and west central Ohio.
